details:
This update for webkit2gtk3 fixes the following issues:
  
- CVE-2025-24201: Fixed out-of-bounds write vulnerability due to that WebGL context primitive restart 
  can be toggled from WebContent process (bsc#1239547).

package.ecosystem: SUSE:Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4-ESPOS
